PSM age 19: Pre-matching
------------------------

```{r pre19, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(mitools)
library(survey)
library(MatchIt)
library(snowfall)
#Load data
load(file="psm98.03.RData")
source("lib/matchItAddOn.R")
#Unmatched
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(general6) ~ treatment + scale(general5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(work6) ~ treatment + scale(work5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(living6) ~ treatment + scale(living5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(money6) ~ treatment + scale(money5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(people6) ~ treatment + scale(people5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(social6) ~ treatment + scale(social5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(home6) ~ treatment + scale(home5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(career6) ~ treatment + scale(career5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(future6) ~ treatment + scale(future5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(independence6) ~ treatment + scale(independence5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(lesiure6) ~ treatment + scale(lesiure5)) ) ))
	summary(MIcombine(with(d98.03, svyglm(scale(location6) ~ treatment + scale(location5)) ) ))
```

PSM Age 19: Matching
------------------------
```{r psm19, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#Propensity score matching
	psmformula <- paste("treatment~",
		paste0(names(MIimp$imputations[[1]])[c(1:72, 94:95,98,100)],
			   collapse = "+") )
	data <- MIimp$imputations
	#Set up parallel settings
	sfInit(parallel=TRUE, cpus=5)
	sfLibrary(MatchIt)
	#export any object you want each of the clusters to have access to
	sfExport("data"); sfExport("psmformula")
	#Run multilevel models
	match1 <- sfLapply(data, function(x){
		set.seed(100)
		matchit(as.formula(psmformula),data = x[,c(1:72,73:84,92,94:95,98,100:101)],
				method= "nearest", discard="both",
				caliper = .20, distance="logit", 
				distance.options=list(maxit=100),
				exact = c("egp", "sex", "state", "indig"))
		}
	)
	#Extract output
	sfExport("match1")
	cmatch1 <- sfLapply(match1, function(x){
		set.seed(100)
		summary(x, addlvariables=NULL, interactions=TRUE,standardize=TRUE)
		}
	)
	sfStop()
	#Distance post matching
	sapply(cmatch1, function(x) head(meandifftable(x)))
	#cohen's d differences pre-matching
	sapply(cmatch1, all_meandiffcount)
	#cohen's d differences post-matching
	sapply(cmatch1, matched_meandiffcount)	
	#Extract matched data
	dmatch <- lapply(match1, match.data)
	cat("Total sample size: ", mean(sapply(dmatch, nrow)))
	cat("Group sample size:\n",rowMeans(sapply(dmatch, function(x) table(x$treatment))))
	#Roll back into an imputation list
	psmData <- imputationList(dmatch)
	d98.03 <- svydesign(data = psmData, id = ~sch)
	
```
